main event: A round object the size of a baseball was observed flying out in Santa Rosa, Texas on November 23, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3 hours with the object still in sight at the end., The object was only one in number., The observation was categorized as a ground visual., There were other unidentified witnesses who did not admit to seeing the object., The report includes annotations and sketches but no photographs.
witness description: no witnesses admitted to seeing the object
